creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: tall, slender deep red/black basket; 4-sided base flairs out into octagonal form near top; open weave with very thin, wiry strands of bamboo that form a star-shaped pattern; woven handle tapers towards center, with looping ornamentation; center lacquered bamboo cylinder with copper lining
signed: bottom of basket: 竹雲斎造之 {Chikuunsai kore o tsukuru} (Chikuunsai made this)
title: Openwork octagonal flower basket
